enum.name: SysIDs
enum.description: Enum that lists all the system IDs of the various devices

enum.name: SystemTMList
enum.description: Enum list for all the telemetries that can be requested

entry.name: MAV_SYS_ID
entry.description: State of init results about system hardware/software components

entry.name: MAV_TASK_STATS_ID
entry.description: Task scheduler statistics answer: n mavlink messages where n is the number of tasks

entry.name: MAV_REGISTRY_ID
entry.description: Command to fetch all registry keys

enum.name: SensorsTMList
enum.description: Enum list of all sensors telemetries that can be requested

entry.name: MAV_CMD_SAVE_CALIBRATION
entry.description: Command to save the current calibration into a file

entry.name: MAV_CMD_FORCE_LAUNCH
entry.description: Command to force the launch state on the rocket

entry.name: MAV_CMD_FORCE_DEPLOYMENT
entry.description: Command to activate the thermal cutters and cut the drogue, activating both thermal cutters sequentially

entry.name: MAV_CMD_FORCE_LANDING
entry.description: Command to communicate the end of the mission and close the file descriptors in the SD card

entry.name: MAV_CMD_STOP_LOGGING
entry.description: Command to permanently close the log file

entry.name: MAV_CMD_FORCE_REBOOT
entry.description: Command to reset the board from test status

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ENTER_TEST_MODE
entry.description: Command to enter the test mode

entry.name: MAV_CMD_EXIT_TEST_MODE
entry.description: Command to exit the test mode

entry.name: MAV_CMD_START_RECORDING
entry.description: Command to start the internal cameras recordings

entry.name: MAV_CMD_STOP_RECORDING
entry.description: Command to stop the internal cameras recordings

entry.name: MAV_CMD_OPEN_NITROGEN
entry.description: Command to open the nitrogen valve

entry.name: MAV_CMD_REGISTRY_LOAD
entry.description: Command to reload the registry from memory

entry.name: MAV_CMD_REGISTRY_SAVE
entry.description: Command to commit the registry to memory

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ENTER_HIL
entry.description: Command to enter HIL mode at next reboot

entry.name: MAV_CMD_EXIT_HIL
entry.description: Command to exit HIL mode at next reboot

entry.name: MAV_CMD_RESET_ALGORITHM
entry.description: Command to reset the set algorithm. Used for now in ARP to reset the follow algorithm and return to armed state.

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ARP_FORCE_NO_FEEDBACK
entry.description: Command to force ARP system to entern the no feedback from VN300 state

entry.name: MAV_CMD_ARP_FOLLOW
entry.description: Command to enter in the ARP's follow state and procedure to follow the rocket

message.name: PING_TC
message.description: TC to ping the rocket (expects an ACK message as a response)
message.field: Timestamp to identify when it was sent

message.name: COMMAND_TC
message.description: TC containing a command with no parameters that trigger some action
message.field: A member of the MavCommandList enum

message.name: SYSTEM_TM_REQUEST_TC
message.description: TC containing a request for the status of a board
message.field: A member of the SystemTMList enum

message.name: SENSOR_TM_REQUEST_TC
message.description: TC containing a request for sensors telemetry
message.field: A member of the SensorTMList enum

message.name: SERVO_TM_REQUEST_TC
message.description: TC containing a request for servo telemetry
message.field: A member of the ServosList enum

message.name: SET_SERVO_ANGLE_TC
message.description: Sets the angle of a certain servo
message.field: A member of the ServosList enum

message.name: RESET_SERVO_TC
message.description: Resets the specified servo
message.field: A member of the ServosList enum

message.name: WIGGLE_SERVO_TC
message.description: Wiggles the specified servo
message.field: A member of the ServosList enum

message.name: SET_REFERENCE_ALTITUDE_TC
message.description: Sets the reference altitude for the altimeter

message.name: SET_REFERENCE_TEMPERATURE_TC
message.description: Sets the reference temperature for the altimeter

message.name: SET_ORIENTATION_TC
message.description: Sets current orientation for the navigation system

message.name: SET_ORIENTATION_QUAT_TC
message.description: Sets current orientation for the navigation system using a quaternion

message.name: SET_COORDINATES_TC
message.description: Sets current coordinates

message.name: RAW_EVENT_TC
message.description: TC containing a raw event to be posted directly in the EventBroker
message.field: Id of the topic to which the event should be posted
Id of the event to be posted

message.name: SET_DEPLOYMENT_ALTITUDE_TC
message.description: Sets the deployment altitude for the main parachute

message.name: SET_TARGET_COORDINATES_TC
message.description: Sets the target coordinates

message.name: SET_ALGORITHM_TC
message.description: Sets the algorithm number (for parafoil guidance)

message.name: SET_CALIBRATION_PRESSURE_TC
message.description: Set the pressure used for analog pressure calibration

message.name: SET_INITIAL_MEA_MASS_TC
message.description: Set the initial MEA mass

message.name: SET_ATOMIC_VALVE_TIMING_TC
message.description: Sets the maximum time that the valves can be open atomically
message.field: A member of the ServosList enum

message.name: SET_VALVE_MAXIMUM_APERTURE_TC
message.description: Sets the maximum aperture of the specified valve. Set as value from 0 to 1
message.field: A member of the ServosList enum

message.name: CONRIG_STATE_TC
message.description: Send the state of the conrig buttons

message.name: SET_IGNITION_TIME_TC
message.description: Sets the time in ms that the igniter stays on before the oxidant valve is opened

message.name: SET_NITROGEN_TIME_TC
message.description: Sets the time in ms that the nitrogen will stay open

message.name: SET_COOLING_TIME_TC
message.description: Sets the time in ms that the system will wait before disarming after firing

message.name: SET_STEPPER_ANGLE_TC
message.description: Move the stepper of a certain angle
message.field: A member of the StepperList enum

message.name: SET_STEPPER_STEPS_TC
message.description: Move the stepper of a certain amount of steps
message.field: A member of the StepperList enum

message.name: SET_STEPPER_MULTIPLIER_TC
message.description: Set the multiplier of the stepper
message.field: A member of the StepperList enum

message.name: SET_ANTENNA_COORDINATES_ARP_TC
message.description: Sets current antennas coordinates

message.name: SET_ROCKET_COORDINATES_ARP_TC
message.description: Sets current rocket coordinates

message.name: ARP_COMMAND_TC
message.description: TC containing a command with no parameters that trigger some action
message.field: A member of the MavCommandList enum

message.name: ACK_TM
message.description: TM containing an ACK message to notify that the message has been processed correctly
message.field: Message id of the received message
Sequence number of the received message

message.name: NACK_TM
message.description: TM containing a NACK message to notify that the received message was invalid
message.field: Message id of the received message
Sequence number of the received message
Error core that generated the NACK

message.name: WACK_TM
message.description: TM containing an ACK message to notify that the message has been processed with a warning
message.field: Message id of the received message
Sequence number of the received message
Error core that generated the WACK

message.name: GPS_TM
message.field: Wether the GPS has a FIX

message.name: SENSOR_STATE_TM
message.field: Boolean that represents the init state
Boolean that represents the enabled state

message.name: SERVO_TM
message.field: A member of the ServosList enum

message.name: PIN_TM
message.field: A member of the PinsList enum

message.name: ARP_TM
message.field: StepperX current position wrt the boot position
StepperY current position wrt the boot position
Wether the GPS has a FIX
Boolean indicating the presence of the main radio
Number of succesfull received mavlink packets
Boolean indicating the presence of the payload radio
Number of succesfull received mavlink packets
Boolean indicating the presence of the ethernet module
Status flag indicating the status of the ethernet PHY
Currently active log file, -1 if the logger is inactive

message.name: SYS_TM
message.description: System status telemetry
message.field: True if the logger started correctly
True if the event broker started correctly
True if the radio started correctly
True if the sensors started correctly
True if the sensors started correctly
True if the pin observer started correctly
True if the can handler started correctly
True if the board scheduler is running

message.name: LOGGER_TM
message.description: Logger status telemetry
message.field: Currently active log file, -1 if the logger is inactive
Number of dropped samples because too large
Number of dropped samples due to fifo full
Number of samples written to buffer
Number of buffers written to disk
Error of the last fwrite() that failed
Average time to perform an fwrite() of a buffer
Max time to perform an fwrite() of a buffer

message.name: MAVLINK_STATS_TM
message.description: Status of MavlinkDriver
message.field: Current len of the occupied portion of the queue
Max occupied len of the queue
Number of packet not sent correctly by the TMTC
Sequence number of last packet received
Sequence number of last packet sent

message.name: CAN_STATS_TM
message.description: Status of CanHandler

message.name: TASK_STATS_TM
message.description: Statistics of the Task Scheduler

message.name: ADA_TM
message.description: Apogee Detection Algorithm status telemetry
message.field: Vertical speed computed by the ADA
Expected pressure at mean sea level
Expected temperature at mean sea level

message.name: NAS_TM
message.description: Navigation System status telemetry
message.field: Navigation system gyroscope bias on x axis
Navigation system gyroscope bias on y axis
Navigation system gyroscope bias on z axis

message.name: MEA_TM
message.description: Mass Estimation Algorithm status telemetry

message.name: ROCKET_FLIGHT_TM
message.description: High Rate Rocket Telemetry
message.field: Wether the GPS has a FIX
NAS gyroscope bias on x axis
NAS gyroscope bias on y axis
NAS gyroscope bias on z axis

message.name: PAYLOAD_FLIGHT_TM
message.description: High Rate Payload Telemetry
message.field: Wether the GPS has a FIX
NAS gyroscope bias on x axis
NAS gyroscope bias on y axis
NAS gyroscope bias on z axis

message.name: ROCKET_STATS_TM
message.description: Low Rate Rocket Telemetry
message.field: System clock at the maximum liftoff acceleration
System clock at maximum measured mach
System clock at max acceleration after apogee
System clock at max acceleration during main deployment
System clock at max pressure in the deployment bay during drogue deployment
Max pressure in the deployment bay during drogue deployment
Amount of available heap in memory
Currently active log file, -1 if the logger is inactive
1 if the board is currently in HIL mode

message.name: PAYLOAD_STATS_TM
message.description: Low Rate Payload Telemetry
message.field: System clock at the maximum liftoff acceleration
System clock at maximum measured mach
System clock at max acceleration after apogee
System clock at max acceleration during main deployment
Amount of available heap in memory
Currently active log file, -1 if the logger is inactive
1 if the board is currently in HIL mode

message.name: GSE_TM
message.description: Ground Segment Equipment telemetry
message.field: 1 If the filling valve is open
1 If the venting valve is open
1 If the release valve is open
1 If the main valve is open
1 If the nitrogen valve is open
Amount of available heap in memory
Currently active log file, -1 if the logger is inactive

message.name: MOTOR_TM
message.description: Motor rocket telemetry
message.field: Pressure inside the combustion chamber used for automatic shutdown
1 If the main valve is open
1 If the venting valve is open
Currently active log file, -1 if the logger is inactive
1 if the board is currently in HIL mode

message.name: CALIBRATION_TM
message.description: Calibration telemetry
